name: Panipuri
desc: An appetizer served with a green dipping sauce. The crispy balls are first deep-fried, then stuffed with a delicious filling through a hole on the top. The bite-sized snack is a common street food in Sumeru.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

value.name: Ricetta: panipuri
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Panipuri.

value.name: Patata
value.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

value.name: Fagioli glabri
value.desc: Un legume comune di Teyvat dal sapore delicato. Lo si può preparare in diversi modi, perciò è molto diffuso in tutto il mondo.

value.name: Spezie
value.desc: Un condimento con vari sapori. A base di frutti di Harra essiccati, sono capaci di arricchire qualsiasi piatto. Gli abitanti di Sumeru affermano che "le spezie si sposano bene con tutto".

value.name: Panipuri delizioso
value.desc: A delicacy that is served with dipping sauce. The round panipuri balls remind you of Slimes. Anticipate the mysterious, bright-colored juice within, and bring it to your mouth — the coolness, sourness, and tingling sensations are bouncing freely on your tongue as if someone has ignited a stick of dreamy dynamite. No wonder that some people in Sumeru are so obsessed with it...

value.name: Panipuri sospetto
value.desc: A delicacy served with dipping sauce. The green sauce gives off a slightly unusual smell, and its color looks a bit off... Maybe it is a good idea to forget about the sauce and directly go for the panipuri balls.
